title: Discovering Photography
description: Picked up photography as a hobby, capturing moments from my travels and daily life. Started sharing my work on Instagram, documenting my journey through the lens.

title: Exploring California
description: Traveled across California, from the tech hubs of Silicon Valley to the scenic coastlines. Photography became a way to document these adventures and share stories.

title: History Enthusiast
description: Deepened my passion for history, reading extensively about world events, cultures, and the stories that shaped our world. Combined this with travel to visit historical sites.

title: Dog Lover & Photographer
description: Developed a special love for dogs and started photographing these wonderful companions. Captured their personalities and the joy they bring, sharing these moments with others.

title: Building My Portfolio
description: Created this portfolio website to showcase my work, journey, and passions. Combining my technical skills with my love for photography, travel, and storytelling.
